name: AlienVaultOTX
description: Return Pulse and passive DNS information from AlienVault OTX

options.name: Ignored Domain List
options.description: Comma delimited list of domains you do not wish to search (exact matches required).

options.name: Ignored Domain Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be searched.

options.name: Ignored IP Regex
options.description: IP Addresses that match the given regex will not be searched.

options.name: Hide Results without Pulses
options.description: If checked, the integration will not display a result if there are no related Pulses

options.name: Max Concurrent Search Requests
options.description: Maximum number of concurrent search requests (defaults to 10).  Integration must be restarted after changing this option.

options.name: Minimum Time Between Searches
options.description: Minimum amount of time in milliseconds between each entity search (defaults to 25).  Integration must be restarted after changing this option.
